name: AlgoValue
overview:
AlgoValue is a 100% determining speed and auditing solution which simplifies complex capital structure valuations and is an efficient support for analytical opinion.

AlgoValue is the only tool which is capable of taking into account the widest range of complex participation rights between preferred share classes.

AlgoValue simplifies simulations of portfolio valuation, next round financing and exit strategies.

AlgoValue is also a quick and efficient tool for audit and IRC 409A valuation projects and complies with AICPA Practice Aid Guide. In addition AlgoValue is used for financial reporting for stock option compensation plans under FASB ASC Topic 718.

AlgoValue is used by highly, reputable domestic and internationally recognized Valuation Firms, US Venture Capital Firms and CFO’s of privately held companies in the US marketplace and worldwide.
